When it comes to farming, then you know it matter for these generations. 14 year old Alexander have been working on the farm since he was seven and he's the 3rd generation fielder after both his father and grandfather were working for many years and and he wants this to continue what family have down and still going strong. Today, Alexander is going to seed the sets of vegetables to grow after the last sets have fully grown to its right amount so it's the right time to plant them once again.

So Alexander left the house from the back of the house because the shed he is approaching are in the backyard for safe keeping and when I mean 'the' shed, the family has two. One for the tools and the other for the bags of soil and other things to plant, plus the other place in the backyard is a greenhouse in which where the plants that are in the pots are kept in storage. He comes through the the tool shed to get gloves and a small spade which he only needs anyway since it was the small seeds to plant it in. He got what he needed but before he would go and straight out to go the other shed, he spotted a item it shined into his eyes and he wondered what it was when it was all left in confusing to Alexander when he see's a unlabled bottle with liquid still filled it up and maybe it haven't been opened in ages.

"Mmm, that looks a bit strange to be left in there for ages." Said Alexander before he holds the bottle looking curiously before he asks. "I wonder what it tastes like? I mean, should I drink it now or later after planting?"

So a big thought from Alexander who thinks of two ways by staring at the bottle and the vegetable pit with wood surrounding it. It is a curious bottle he find but he was destined to drink it just to give it a try if it tastes good or not. So he made his mind already and shrugged before he decided to...

12313.content:
So a big thought from Alexander who thinks of two ways by staring at the bottle and the vegetable pit with wood surrounding it. It is a curious bottle he find but he was destined to drink it just to give it a try if it tastes good or not. So he made his mind already and shrugged before he decided to pick up a phone and call his friend to choose what Alexander should do instead. He gonna call his friend named Peter who met him throughout their lives although he is older than him by a year and a month gap between them. He understands that family traditions are more important than just doing whatever leisure they got but as long Alexander is free which he does, then that wouldn't be a problem for them anyway.

He waited for Peter to answer phone for the few seconds before he answered the phone. "Hello?" Peter's voice asked.

"Hey Pete it's me, I'm kinda into this strange thing and I need help." Alexander replied.

"Struggling to find a tools you looking for again isn't?" Peter asked with a bit of a joke.

"It's not that, it's that strange bottle I found and it still filled in and I'm not sure should I drink it now or later?" Alexander was concerned while looking at the bottle again.

"But why do you ask me for that anyway?" Peter was curious to ask his friend's reason.

"It's just I got that planting thing to do and I'm not too good at choices when I'm working, so I thought I'm asking you for a help." Alexander explained his reasons.

"Okay, it's either up to you, no matter what you want waiting to do. But I might suggest that you should drink it _____ so that your mind would get you off choosing curiously." Said Peter, telling his advice to what Alexander should do and stick with it.
12313.title: Phone a friend

1451.content:
It was the start of the summer vacation. At 10 a.m most teens would be outside, enjoying the sun, but not for Alec. He liked sleeping in at this time around, exspecialy when he had nothing to do today.

When his alarm clock hit 10 a.m, it sounded a typicle alarm clock cry. A hand banged agianst it, shutting the cry off. Alec groaned as he got up. He threw the covers off if him, exposing that he was only dressed in a boxer.He got up and went down stairs for breakfast.

The kitchen was deserted. Alec founded a note on the fridge left by his dad. It said, 'Off to work early. Would be back tonight. Love-Dad.' Alec smiled to himself. The hole house was his for today.

Alec went to the fridge and opened it. He pilled numorous items on it: leftover chicken from last night, dozens of donuts, and a tub of ice cream.

He started to eat and eat and eat, until the food was gone. He patted his engorged stomach, letting loose a belch. "That was *urp* nice," he said. He got off from the kitchen chair and went to the living room to watch some TV.

He he was about to enter the living room, he felt something strange. His belly began to growl. Suddenly, for some reason, the world began to shrink around Alec.

His boxer became very tight around his waist. He looked at himself and saw a belly growing fourth from his body. Soft moobs followed, sagging from his chest.

When the growth finally stoped, Alec saw tgat he was atleast 7 feet tall and gained 50 pounds. Alec was scared but intreaged. He had little idea what happened, but he was starting to like it.
1451.title: Alec's growth.

Since he joined the club, Leo was on the roll when he recently won the county tournament against other local clubs 4 months ago in the Aberdeenshire area. Even his coach (which is his uncle) is very proud what his nephew done during the past year.

Today as by winning the tournament, Leo is just got a month to prepare to compete for the national championship tournament in Edinburgh where the winner will represent Scotland to compete for the World Championships at New York City in United States in 4 months time. But this time there's a big twist where his uncle named Joe met Leo (his nephew) for the big change for the two big tournaments happening.

Joe: Hey Nephew! How's it goin buddy?

Leo: Yeah I'm working on it! Why?

info.description:
Just a remind you before we get any further, this story is actually a sequal from "Teen Boy's Weight Gain". So if you to read that one then you're very welcome. So as for this rules as follows:

*No sex & No toilet stuff (Stay it clean)

*Only the main characters of this story can grow into fat giants but not others.

*They must stay mobile as they're keep on balance

*Their can rips but not the underwear/speedos I don't want them nude

*All of the charcters are human so no weird stuff please.

*Please use good grammar & spelling 100%!

*This is not a shrinking or a weight loss story so please stay in topic

*Please do not add charcter's future age. Stay with the character's current age!

*They cannot die in this story

*I don't want the end of this story. Keep Adding!

And one last thing, Have fun & enjoy this story.

UPDATE 27/1/13: This is a warning for those who adds the chapters of this story from this update as from now on I don't want any short chapters of this story at all. If you add any chapters with one sentence, one paragraph or less then three lines of this story will be automatically deleted indefinitely so please read the rules before adding.

UPDATE 5/10/19: I'm also interested in roleplay, if you want to have a go? If so, either let me know either here or on Discord pjc-fc#4186 and Iâll see what we can come up for this.
info.pretty_title: Attack of the Fat Giant Teen Boys
